content: today we are make and share a new and easy baby lacy beautiful collar pattern this crocheted baby frock collar work up so easy and get little time you can easily to add the pattern in every crochet work like baby dresses/ frocks in cardigan jackets sweaters as you want to make easy to change in others sizes as you want to make we have to explain about all kids and baby sizes in the pattern this adorable crochet collar lacy pattern i have done for cotton baby dress chose any colors for the pattern light dk weight with 3 5mm e hook size
